intro: Psychotria inaequalis, commonly known as the unequal psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves and produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests. Psychotria inaequalis is also known for its chemical properties, which have been studied for potential medicinal uses.
